name: Composite Bow
description: A common weapon used by hunters in the snowfield. Easy to handle with very high accuracy. After enough promotion, it has earned more than half of the affordable civilian market.

normals.name: Normal Attack
normals.description:
While on the ground, draw the bow repeatedly to attack 5 times.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **27.3%** of ATK plus **164**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **24.4%** of ATK plus **146**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **43.8%** of ATK plus **263**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **67.8%** of ATK plus **407**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **62.9%** of ATK plus **377** and knock the target back a short distance.

normals.name: Charged Arrow
normals.description: Tap and hold normal attack to charge an attack. Deal base damage equal to **49.1%** of ATK plus **295**, and **50%** more for each **1** second spent charging, up to **3** seconds. Deal double damage when scoring a headshot or when hitting an enemy's weak point, and knock the target down (headshots are ineffective against Wanderers).

normals.name: Arrow Rain
normals.description: After any normal attack, hold the normal attack button to unleash Arrow Rain, dealing up to **160%** of ATK plus **960** area damage to targets.

normals.name: Air Volley
normals.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row in the air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **31.5%** of ATK plus **189**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **41.4%** of ATK plus **248**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **63%** of ATK plus **378**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **94.8%** of ATK plus **569**.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

dodge.name: Loaded Arrow
dodge.description: Tap attack after dodging to trigger Loaded Arrow, knocking the target back by a short distance and dealing damage equal to **69.3%** of ATK plus **416**.

skill.name: Piercing Shot
skill.description: Backflips and fires **1** piercing shot forward, dealing damage equal to **125.4%** of ATK plus **752** and knocking the target back. **12**-second cooldown.

discharge.name: Explosive Barrage
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and unleash Explosive Barrage on the target, dealing damage equal to **396%** of ATK plus **2376**.
